rows.label: tlk4170042102_msg0001
rows.name:
Now then, class, I want you to
write a short descriptive piece on
the Liberalitan landscape.

rows.label: tlk4170042102_msg0002
rows.name:
It needs to be evocative, so that anyone
reading can immediately picture the
scenery in their mind's eye.

rows.label: tlk4170042102_msg0003
rows.name:
Don't just describe what you see.
Remember to use metaphor and
simile to express your feelings!
